GSD.product_version: versions from v5.9 to before v5.15.33
GSD.description:
remoteproc: Fix count check in rproc_coredump_write()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit 34afac3c75fa08d6fabbab4c93f0a90618afaaa6, it was introduced in version v5.9 by commit 3afdc59e4390487f04f2435b7e8a6289984e0a1e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: remoteproc: Fix count check in rproc_coredump_write()
